title: Ad Commander
description:
Ad Commander is a complete ad management plugin for WordPress. Users can quickly create custom banner image ads, Google AdSense ads, Amazon Associates ads, and ads for other ad networks.

Create groups of rotating banner ads or randomly displaying ads. Insert ads with shortcodes, template tags, blocks, or automatic placements. Inject scripts into the header or footer of your site.

Ad Commander integrates directly with your AdSense account to make implementing AdSense and AMP ads quick and easy.
